summary: A Japanese actress begins having strange visions and experiences after landing a role in a horror film about a real-life murder spree that took place over forty years ago.
cast: Yûka|Karina|Kippei Shîna|Tetta Sugimoto|Shun Oguri|Marika Matsumoto|Mantarô Koichi|Atsushi Haruta|Miki Sanjô|Mao Sasaki|Hiroto Itô|Takako Fuji|Yasutoki Furuya|Tomoko Mochizuki|Hiroshi Okazaki|Tarô Suwa|Kiyoshi Kurosawa|Shôichirô Masumoto
title: Reincarnation
